code: export var createComment=function createComment(comment){return function(dispatch){return fetch("https://national-park.herokuapp.com/".concat(comment.park_id,"/comments"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({comment:comment})}).then(function(response){return response.json();}).then(function(comment){dispatch(addComment(comment));});};};var addComment=function addComment(comment){return{type:"ADD_COMMENT",comment:comment};};
